name: Mozuk
description:
Mozuk is a platformer game made for Juice Jam 2

Fight against skeletons that have taken over the castle. Smash the barrels to replanish your health points.

Controls -

Attack - Left mouse/Right mouse, Dash and Slam while airborne.

Move - Arrow keys

Jump - Spacebar

You can also use a controller

Attack - Square/ Triangle or X and Y

Move - Left Analog stick

Jump - X or A

Game made by

Dragoons - code 

Fireskelet - art
